proyecto_educativo.title: Educational Project
proyecto_educativo.description: Our educational project is based on the integral development of each child, respecting their times and enhancing their unique capacities through a personalized and multidisciplinary approach.
proyecto_educativo.document_content_titl: What will you find in this document?
proyecto_educativo.philosophy_subtitle: The pillars that support our educational vision
proyecto_educativo.philosophy_descriptio: At Plataforma Astral we firmly believe that each child is unique, with their own development rhythm and special potentialities. Our work focuses on:
proyecto_educativo.respect_development_d: Recognizing that each little one advances at their own pace without pressure or comparisons
proyecto_educativo.enhance_capabilities_: Identifying and fostering the individual strengths of each child
proyecto_educativo.integral_development_: Working cognitive, emotional, social and physical aspects harmoniously
proyecto_educativo.collaborative_work_de: Building solid bridges between home and institution for the child's success
proyecto_educativo.objectives_subtitle: Clear and measurable goals for integral development
proyecto_educativo.objective_1: Development of oral language and effective communication
proyecto_educativo.objective_3: Promotion of creativity and artistic expression
proyecto_educativo.objective_4: Development of social and emotional skills
proyecto_educativo.specific_objective_1: Identify and work on specific difficulty areas
proyecto_educativo.early_stimulation_des: Activities designed to enhance cognitive, motor and linguistic development through play and exploration.
proyecto_educativo.individual_attention_: Personalized plans adapted to the specific needs of each child, with continuous monitoring.
proyecto_educativo.continuous_evaluation: Constant progress monitoring through systematic observations and appropriate evaluation tools.
proyecto_educativo.team_subtitle: Specialized professionals working together for integral development
proyecto_educativo.team_parvularia_desc: Educators with specialized training in child development and active methodologies
proyecto_educativo.team_therapist_desc: Specialist in oral language stimulation, comprehension and verbal expression
proyecto_educativo.team_psychologist_des: Professional who works on emotional development, social and school adaptation
proyecto_educativo.team_occupational_des: Specialist in fine motor development, coordination and daily living skills
proyecto_educativo.team_meetings: Our team meets weekly to review cases and adjust strategies, ensuring a comprehensive and coordinated approach for each child.
proyecto_educativo.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the video capsule?

cpa.title: CPA Parent Center
cpa.subtitle: Why join the CPA?
cpa.description: Discover the benefits of being an active part of our educational community
cpa.feature_community_desc: More than 80 committed families working together for our children's education
cpa.feature_transparency_desc: Open management and democratic decisions with monthly accountability
cpa.feature_resources_desc: Access to educational workshops, specialist talks and teaching materials
cpa.feature_support_desc: Direct connection with other parents and education professionals
cpa.feature_participation_desc: Direct involvement in school activities and community events
cpa.feature_recognition_desc: Valuation of each family's contribution to educational development
centro_consejo.testimonials.rosa_martine: The early stimulation programs have been incredible for my baby's development.
centro_consejo.testimonials.juan_perez.c: The personalized attention for my 18-month-old has been exceptional.
centro_consejo.testimonials.maria_gonzal: The Parent Center has allowed me to be more connected to my daughter's education.
centro_consejo.testimonials.carlos_rodri: Transparency in management gives us confidence in the educational project.
centro_consejo.testimonials.ana_silva.co: The workshops have helped us understand child development much better.
centro_consejo.testimonials.pedro_morale: The community is incredible, there's always support and collaboration between families.
centro_consejo.testimonials.isabel_ferna: Direct communication with teachers has improved a lot since I joined.
centro_consejo.testimonials.roberto_jime: The educational resources we share between families are invaluable.
The transition to primary school has been smooth thanks to the excellent preparation.
centro_consejo.testimonials.miguel_torre: The support network between parents is fundamental for our children's development.
centro_consejo.testimonials.patricia_lop: Family events have helped us create stronger bonds with the school.
centro_consejo.testimonials.francisco_he: Transparency in resource use gives us great confidence.
centro_consejo.testimonials.sofia_mendoz: Parenting workshops have transformed my way of educating at home.
centro_consejo.testimonials.diego_castro: Participation in school activities has strengthened my relationship with my child.
centro_consejo.testimonials.valentina_ru: Emotional support between families is what I value most about the parent center.
centro_consejo.testimonials.andres_moren: Collaboration between parents and teachers has significantly improved education.
centro_consejo.testimonials.daniela_pare: The resources we share have enriched all the children's learning.
centro_consejo.testimonials.luis_sanchez: The academic planning tools help us monitor our child's progress effectively.
centro_consejo.testimonials.catalina_lop: The technical-professional orientation has prepared my daughter perfectly for her career.
centro_consejo.testimonials.fernando_gar: The university preparation programs have been invaluable for college admissions.
centro_consejo.testimonials.gabriela_roj: The technical training programs give our children real professional opportunities.
centro_consejo.testimonials.ricardo_mora: The research and thesis support has been excellent for our daughter's studies.
centro_consejo.testimonials.antonia_vega: The postgraduate support community has been essential for our family.
centro_consejo.testimonials.pablo_castil: The doctoral research resources available are world-class.
centro_consejo.testimonials.elena_martin: The SENCE-certified programs have given our son excellent job prospects.
centro_consejo.testimonials.carolina_sil: The specialized technical education has opened many doors for our daughter.

home.welcome.title: Welcome to Plataforma Astral
home.welcome.description: We are an institutional SaaS platform that connects multiple educational institutions, providing comprehensive management tools for teachers, parents and administrators.
home.mission.title: Our Mission
home.mission.description: To provide educational institutions with advanced technological tools that enhance learning, facilitate collaboration and optimize educational processes across multiple organizations.
home.vision.title: Our Vision
home.vision.description: To become the leading educational SaaS platform that transforms how institutions manage education, connecting communities and fostering collaborative learning environments worldwide.
home.features.title: Why choose Plataforma Astral?
home.features.description: Discover a comprehensive platform designed for educational institutions, with powerful tools for management, communication and academic tracking. We support multiple institutions with scalable solutions.
home.excellence.title: Institutional Excellence
home.excellence.description: We manage complete educational processes with advanced tools that optimize learning and academic development across multiple institutions.
home.team.title: Multidisciplinary Collaboration
home.team.description: We facilitate coordination between multidisciplinary teams from different institutions, connecting psychologists, speech therapists, social workers and specialized educators.
home.innovation.title: SaaS Technological Innovation
home.innovation.description: We provide a comprehensive digital platform that simplifies educational management, makes learning more accessible and connects the entire educational community.
home.footer.school.name: Plataforma Astral Educational Platform
home.footer.school.description: Educational SaaS platform connecting institutions, teachers, parents and students in a collaborative learning ecosystem.
home.explore.title: Explore Our Portal
home.explore.description: Discover more about our educational community and stay connected.
